languages.text: "А я благодарю тебя, мой храбрый рыцарь. За отвагу и заботу обо мне".
"And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."
languages.original_text: "А я благодарю тебя, мой храбрый рыцарь. За отвагу и заботу обо мне".

traits.locale_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."
"And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."
"And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."
"And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."
"And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

languages.text: « C'est moi qui vous remercie, mon preux chevalier, pour avoir été si vaillant et si attentionné. »
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: « C'est moi qui vous remercie, mon preux chevalier, pour avoir été si vaillant et si attentionné. »

languages.text: 「そしてありがとう、輝く鎧をまとった{mf|俺|私}の騎士殿。こんなにも勇敢で、深い思いやりをくれて」
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてありがとう、輝く鎧をまとった{mf|俺|私}の騎士殿。こんなにも勇敢で、深い思いやりをくれて」

languages.text: «Y yo le agradezco su valentía y su diligencia, mi caballero de brillante armadura».
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: «Y yo le agradezco su valentía y su diligencia, mi caballero de brillante armadura».

languages.text: “我也要感谢你，我穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士，感谢你如此英勇、如此体贴。”
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: “我也要感谢你，我穿着闪亮盔甲的骑士，感谢你如此英勇、如此体贴。”

languages.text: "Bu kadar cesur ve şefkatli olduğun için de teşekkür ederim parlak zırhlı şövalyem."
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar cesur ve şefkatli olduğun için de teşekkür ederim parlak zırhlı şövalyem."

languages.text: "Und ich danke meinem strahlenden Ritter für seinen Mut und seine Dienstbeflissenheit."
languages.original_text: "And I thank you, my knight in shining armour, for being so valiant and solicitous."

traits.locale_text: "Und ich danke meinem strahlenden Ritter für seinen Mut und seine Dienstbeflissenheit."
